nodes.bodyText: Could we use a Slf4j logger instead of system.err? Or no point?
It will look kinda weird? since it adds extra info... not sure, its easy enough to add it, its a bit different from normal "logging"
I think in this specific case it does make sense to use System.err since the log files would be filled with data which is not really useful. It have to be quite apparent that the server can't start.
